h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Staff of Blazing Karma Location
content: The Staff of Blazing Karma can be found in Chapter 5 - Flaming Mountains. It requires you to defeat three bosses: Flint Chief, Flint Vanguard, and the Mother of Flamlings.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Staff_of_Blazing_Karma.md', within the main section titled 'Staff of Blazing Karma', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Staff of Blazing Karma Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Staff of Blazing Karma can be found in Chapter 5 - Flaming Mountains. It requires you to defeat three bosses: Flint Chief, Flint Vanguard, and the Mother of Flamlings.
